tasks.test: deno check tools/**/*.ts tests/**/*.ts && deno test --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-net --coverage=coverage/ && deno coverage coverage/ --lcov --output=coverage.lcov && deno run --allow-read --allow-run tests/helpers/check-coverage.ts 45
tasks.gas:push: cd apps-script && npx tsc && npx clasp push --force
tasks.gas:deploy: deno task gas:push && deno task gas:setup
